lead_paragraph: AT UNITED NATIONS HEADQUARTERS, Australia, Saturday, Aug. 1 (AP) -- Allied action against enemy bases at Guadalcanal, in the Solomon Islands, disclosed that Japanese infiltrations into the island had been going on for about six weeks, a military spokesman said here today.
abstract: claim damage inflicted in Townsville raid
